    What is a partnership agreement?

    When the Foundation concludes an agreement with the Bitypeer Exchange, a page is created where only affiliates can register for sale, and sales products can only be provided to specific users.

    Affiliate Benifits
    • Foundation exclusive sales registration - list detection by foundation code

    • Bitypeer Automapping – Auto mapping is provided only for company coins affiliated with us.

      When the buyer enters the quantity and price, they can purchase coins by automatically mapping the appropriate seller. Only we can do it.

    • Provide API – Provide API so that you can develop your own and proceed with the purchase selectively
    Affiliate Form
